description: a(n) = norm of Heilbronn sum NH_{p}, with p = prime(n).
references: D. H. and Emma Lehmer, Cyclotomy for nonsquarefree moduli, pp. 276-300 of Analytic Number Theory (Philadelphia 1980), Lect. Notes Math. 899 (1981).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: W. L. Fouch√©, Arithmetic properties of Heilbronn sums, J. Number Theory, 19 (1984), 1-6.
Ken Yamamura, A table of absolute norms of Heilbronn sums, Proc. Japan Acad. Ser. A Math. Sci., Volume 71, Number 1 (1995), 22-23.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 10 2003
